entry.sentence: After a three-hour journey , the two ladies arrived at the train station closest to the monastery .

entry.sentence: It was harnessed with two lean nags , and on the goat , in a threadbare coat with a formerly black but now somewhat foxy fur collar , sat Christian , the factotum of the monastery .

entry.sentence: `` Good day , Christian , '' said Aunt Agnes kindly .

entry.sentence: All the ladies of the convent were on good terms with Christian , because he was needed for all sorts of things for which female strength was not sufficient .

entry.sentence: Christian looked down at Griseldis from the side , and her young , laughing face conjured a friendly smile around his mouth as well .

entry.sentence: My nags have certainly become as stiff as I myself , '' he said , half condescendingly , half reproachfully .
